description:
July 1997: everybody on TV is talking about the prophecies of Nostradamus, and the famous spoon bending boy Bunmei.  Maya insists that she hates the occult, and becomes the principal with the intent of disbanding the school.  Then, the shady-looking guy who appeared from the sky, Uchida Fumiaki, appears as a new teacher.  He was a time agent, sent to the past to save the earth!!
Source: crunchyroll
